summary.span: 包装一个指定的阅读器和向该包装后的阅读器委托所有 调用的类。

span.span: A class that wraps a specified reader and delegates all calls to the wrapped reader.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过访问的读取器包装属性。The reader that is wrapped can be accessed through the property. 调用方法以设置已包装的读取器并初始化属性。Call the method to set the wrapped reader and initialize the property.
